name: Longevity
description:
Hello!

Welcome to Longevity, a exploration based build that covers a small but very important region in the novel I am writing. In here you will find a relaxing atmosphere full of many places to explore and see to gain insight on the looming threat that is to come. 

This is a very early build, there are several game mechanics missing, almost everything except for map design is going to change in time. Nevertheless, I hope you enjoy exploring for a few minutes or maybe even an hour as much as I had fun creating this world. 

Any support such as criticisms, things you would like to see, and more would be greatly appreciated by me. Thank you so much!
